snippet: Forensic experts, analyzing indentations in the paper, helped recover the work of a blind British woman who did not know she had begun writing a novel with a pen that had run dry.
abstract: Forensic experts, analyzing indentations in the paper, helped recover the work of a blind British woman who did not know she had begun writing a novel with a pen that had run dry.

headline.seo: Dorset Police Solve Mystery of Invisible Manuscript
headline.main: The Case of a Blind Woman and Her Invisible Manuscript
